page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN MARKFIELD
page.content: A day for me would be to get up at 7.30.At 7.40 I would go down for my breakfast.I have cereal with milk,coffee and fruit juice.I have a wash and clean my teeth.Then at 8.30 I would go next door and call for Jemma.Then we would walk to the bus stop. The bus comes at about 8.50. The school opens at 8.55.We go straight in.First I would have P.E then Humanities,after that we would have break.We play poddy.You need four or more people to play.Then after break we have Assignment.Then at 12.50 we have lunch.After lunch we have got English till 3.30.We wait for our buses to take us home.When I get home I change and then go and play with Jemma,Julie and Helen.
